verbs.description: < p > Chinese officials [V: are] hoping to mollify President Donald Trump 's oft - stated displeasure with America 's huge trade imbalance with China by pledging to import at least $ 200 billion more in American - made products , the director of the White House National Economic Council said Friday.</p >
